40 void Controller::Execute()
41 {
42  //TODO -> Do some checks here to determine if there is a collision pending
43 
44  //Waypoints are worked out in the pathfinder functions
45 
46  std::cout << "\n Waypoint count: " + Targets.size() << std::endl;
47 
48  int a = Targets.size();
49  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < Targets.size(); i++)
50  {
51  nav_msgs::Odometry start = ROSNode_->bot_odom;
52  geometry_msgs::Point goal = Targets.at(i);
53 
54  // Finding the shortest path
55  Node start_node = _pathPlanning.SetNodeFromOdom(start);
56  Node goal_node = _pathPlanning.SetNodeFromPoint(goal);
57  start_node = _pathPlanning.FindClosestNode(_node, start_node);
58  goal_node = _pathPlanning.FindClosestNode(_node, goal_node);
59  std::vector<Node> path = _pathPlanning.ShortestPath(start_node, goal_node);
60 
61  ROSNode_->setShelfDetectingFlag(true);
62 
63  //Drive to each of the waypoints
64  for (unsigned int k = 0; k < path.size(); k++) {
65  geometry_msgs::Point steps;
66  steps.x = path.at(k).X;
67  steps.y = path.at(k).Y;
68  //Controller::TurnTo(steps);
69 
70  //check for collision
71  //std::cout << "Robot turned towards waypoint. Driving function started" << std::endl;
72 
73  Controller::DriveTo(steps);
74  }
75 
76  //Drive to the final point to the goal
77 
78  Controller::DriveTo(goal);
79 
80  ROSNode_->setShelfDetectingFlag(false);
81 
82  std::cout << "\n Robot reached target. Holding in place to pick up / drop off (emulate): " << std::endl;
83 
84  //Stop the robot for a few seconds in place
85  std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::seconds(10));
86  }
87 
88  std::cout << "\n Driving complete: " + Targets.size() << std::endl;
89 }

91 void Controller::StartExecute() {
92  std::thread execThread(&Controller::ThreadedExecute, this);
93  execThread.detach(); // Detaching the thread if we don't need to join it later
94 }
95 
96 void Controller::ThreadedExecute() {
97  // Wait until ROSNode_->startNode becomes true
98  unsigned int iterator = 0;
99  while (true) {
100  {
101  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(mtx); // Lock to check the shared variable safely
102  if (ROSNode_->startNode) {
103  break; // Exit the loop if startNode is true
104  }
105  std::cout << "Failed attempt to run Controller::Execute thread. Iterations: " << ++iterator << std::endl;
106  std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::milliseconds(100)); // Sleep to prevent busy waiting
107  }
108  std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::milliseconds(100)); // Sleep to prevent busy waiting
109  }
110  std::cout << "Execute thread enabled after iterations: " << iterator << std::endl;
111 
112  Execute(); // Now startNode is true, proceed with Execute
113 }

177 void Controller::DriveTo(geometry_msgs::Point location)
178  {
179 
180  std::cout << "Driving to x:" << location.x << ", y: " << location.y << "..." << std::endl;
181  // return;
182  // Add driving logic here
183  double tolerance_ = 0.4;
184 
185 
186  nav_msgs::Odometry odom = ROSNode_->returnOdom(); //Gathered from ROSNode
187 
188 
189  //Turn the location into a pose
190 
191  geometry_msgs::Pose GoalPose;
192  GoalPose.position = location;
193  GoalPose.orientation = odom.pose.pose.orientation; //Robots current direction facing is the orientation
194 
195  ROSNode_->sendGoal(GoalPose);
196 
197  //Hold in this function until the goal is reached
198  double hyp = 9999;
199 
200  int iterator = 0;
201 
202  while (true)
203  {
204  nav_msgs::Odometry odom = ROSNode_->returnOdom(); //Gathered from ROSNode
205 
206  double current_x = odom.pose.pose.position.x;
207  double current_y = odom.pose.pose.position.y;
208 
209  double delta_x = location.x - current_x;
210  double delta_y = location.y - current_y;
211 
212  double hyp = sqrt(delta_x * delta_x + delta_y * delta_y);
213 
214  // ROSNode_->sendGoal(GoalPose);
215  double i = abs(hyp);
216  if (abs(hyp) <= tolerance_){
217  break;
218  }
219 
220  std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::seconds(1));
221  std::cout << "Waiting to reach to x:" << location.x << ", y: " << location.y << ". Iterator: " << ++iterator << std::endl;
222 
223  }
224 }
225 
228 void Controller::TurnTo(geometry_msgs::Point target)
229 {
230 
231  std::cout << "Initial rotation not functional: Target " << target << "..." << std::endl;
232  return;
233 
234  nav_msgs::Odometry odom = ROSNode_->returnOdom(); //Gathered from ROSNode
235 
236  //Turn the location into a pose
237 
238  geometry_msgs::Pose GoalPose;
239  GoalPose.position = odom.pose.pose.position;
240  //GoalPose.orientation = odom.pose.pose; //Robots current direction facing is the orientation
241 
242  ROSNode_->sendGoal(GoalPose);
243 
244 
245  //Function helpers
246  double angleTolerance = 0.1;
247  double turningSpeed = 0.2; // Set the angular velocity to make the TurtleBot rotate. Adjust the value as needed
248 
249  //Use another function to calculate the turning required
250  double delta_yaw = Controller::GetRotationTo(target);
251 
252  // If rotation is negative, swap direction
253  if (delta_yaw < 0) turningSpeed = -turningSpeed;
254 
255  // Publish the command to start the rotation
256  //ROSNode::sendCmd(0,0,0,0,0,turningSpeed);
257 
258  // Keep rotating until the angle difference is within tolerance
259  while (abs(delta_yaw) > angleTolerance)
260  {
261  delta_yaw = Controller::GetRotationTo(target);
262 
263  // If rotation is negative, swap direction
264  // if (delta_yaw > M_PI * 2) delta_yaw = delta_yaw - M_PI * 2;
265  std::cout << "Rotation remaining: " << delta_yaw << std::endl;
266 
267  // Pause briefly to control the loop rate
268 
269  ROSNode_->sendCmd(0,0,0,0,0,turningSpeed);
270  std::this_thread::sleep_for(std::chrono::milliseconds(2));
271  }
272 }
273 
275 double Controller::GetRotationTo(geometry_msgs::Point target)
276 {
277  // Get the current pose of the robot
278  nav_msgs::Odometry odom = ROSNode_->returnOdom(); //Gathered from ROSNode
279 
280  double current_x = odom.pose.pose.position.x;
281  double current_y = odom.pose.pose.position.y;
282 
283  double delta_x = target.x - current_x;
284  double delta_y = target.y - current_y;
285 
286  double targetYaw = atan2(delta_y, delta_x);
287 
288  Eigen::Quaterniond q;
289  double angle_ = odom.twist.twist.angular.z;
290 
291  /*
292  q.coeffs() << pose.Pose.Pose.Orientation.W,
293  pose.Pose.Pose.Orientation.X, pose.Pose.Pose.Orientation.Y,
294  pose.Pose.Pose.Orientation.Z;
295 
296  Eigen::Vector3d euler_angles = q.toRotationMatrix().eulerAngles(0,1,2);
297  */
298 
299  // Extract the current yaw angle
300  //double CurrentRotation = euler_angles[2];
301  double CurrentRotation = angle_;
302 
303  double delta_yaw = targetYaw - CurrentRotation;
304 
305  return delta_yaw;
306 }
